review: This is a nice addition to our household...view  movies or TV hits you like when you want -- at the tip your fingers. Voice command finds it fast!...Easy to operate...we are non-techs. Beautiful Screen Saver pics...TV has to be HD ready with an HD port...I called about the requirements before we got this one.  Amazon has many more options available for the Old Silver Screen movies, then Netflix -- if you are into them, as we are. And, no need to buy the newest television to make Amazon Fire TV work...we loved this feature the best!!
